name: When The World Ended
description:
Welcome To When The World Ended! 

Story: You awake to a zombie outbreak, unaware of what happened. You wander through the destroyed world as you try to get used to the new normal. 

In-Game Controls: 

WASD - Movement 

Mouse - Aim 

Click or Z - Attack 

1 - Interact 

2 - Primary Weapon 

3 - Secondary Weapon 

4 - Melee Weapon 

Please report any bugs in the comments!
